TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void ZoomChangedEventHandler(object sender, ZoomChangeEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed ZoomChangedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.summary: Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:Microsoft.Reporting.WinForms.ReportViewer.ZoomChange"> event of a <xref:Microsoft.Reporting.WinForms.ReportViewer>.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
